attributes.action: To solve the climate change problem
attributes.background: I want to change this problem because it is going to affect children's futures as there is CO2 polluting our world. If we don't change anything then in around 80 years parts of the world will start going underwater.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about climate change, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You may also wish to sign one of these petitions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/231038 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/234717 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/231518 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/230041
